#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

string reverse(string str){
    string rev="";
    for(int i=str.length()-1;i>=0;i--)
        rev+=str[i];
    return rev;
}

int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string str;
        cin>>str;
        int d;
        cin>>d;
        int n=str.length();
        cout<<str.substr(d-1,n-d+1);
        if((n-d+1)%2==0)
            cout<<str.substr(0,d-1)<<endl;
        else
            cout<< reverse(str.substr(0,d-1)) <<endl;
    }
}
